text: José Ángel Gurría Treviño, also known as Ángel Gurría, (born 8 May 1950) is a Mexican economist and politician. From 1 June 2006 to 31 May 2021, he was the secretary-general of the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD). ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican economists Category:Secretaries General of OECD Category:Politicians from Tamaulipas
title: José Ángel Gurría
